mapper.select: SELECT sku.*, pro.id pro_id, pro.brand_id pro_brand_id, pro.product_category_id pro_product_category_id, pro.feight_template_id pro_feight_template_id, pro.product_attribute_category_id pro_product_attribute_category_id, pro.name pro_name, pro.pic pro_pic, pro.publish_status pro_publish_status, pro.new_status pro_new_status, pro.sale pro_sale, pro.gift_growth pro_gift_growth, pro.gift_point pro_gift_point, pro.use_point_limit pro_se_point_limit, pro.sub_title pro_sub_title, pro.description pro_description, pro.unit pro_unit, pro.weight pro_weight, pro.preview_status pro_preview_status, pro.service_ids pro_service_ids, pro.album_pics pro_album_pics, pro.detail_title pro_detail_title, pro.detail_desc pro_detail_desc, pro.detail_html pro_detail_html, pro.detail_mobile_html pro_detail_mobile_html, pro.promotion_start_time pro_promotion_start_time, pro.promotion_end_time pro_promotion_end_time, pro.promotion_per_limit pro_promotion_per_limit, pro.promotion_type pro_romotion_type, pro.brand_name pro_brand_name, pro.product_category_name pro_product_category_name, pro.price pro_price FROM `pms_sku_stock` sku LEFT JOIN `pms_product` pro ON pro.id= sku.`product_id` WHERE pro.id=#{productid} and sku.id = #{skuid};
SELECT a.id,a.name, av.value var_value FROM pms_product_attribute a LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_value av ON av.product_attribute_id = a.id WHERE a.type = 0 AND av.product_id = #{productid}
select s.id , s.price, a.value att_value FROM pms_sku_stock s LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_value a ON a.`skuid` =s.id where s.product_id = #{productid}
